text: If you're reading this strip for "payoffs" I don't think you're fully grasping it.

name: deimosrising
text: In that sense I'd argue that an old southern man investing all his fortunes into a program that makes you look pregnant, only to regret his decision is something of a nontraditional payoff.

name: waddlerz
text: actually, i think he is just too arrogant to appreciate it

name: mikeronomicon
text: You have not even begun to be mocked, jackass.

name: drjawesome
text: <i>You're welcome!<i>

name: themeth
text: Whoops!

name: dimwittedullard
text: I..i'm getting dragged into his balck hole of Douchebaggery. I can't....resist....must...lame...asherdan.. (to self) "NO! THAT'S WHAT HE WANTS! THAT'S HOW HE WINS! SINCE HE WILL NEVER HAVE PHYSICAL OFFSPRING, THIS IS HOW HE REPRODUCES! HE BURROWS HIMSELF INTO YOUR SOUL UNTIL YOU ARE FILLED WITH THE SAME BILE THAT CONSUMES HIM! RESIST! DAMMIT, MAN RESIST! I...I....Can't resist. I lose.

name: dimwittedullard
text: I'm going through these archives, and everyone succombs to the sickness eventually. After seeing that absolutely every comment that he makes is arrogant and sardonic, and he has a comment on every page, you just can't help yourself...You respond. He is the type of person who would cackle in your face, as you lose control of your body and emotions, and beat him mercelessly. The laughter would fuel your rage, and you'd beat him even more. Ifyou didn't accidentally kill him, Eventually the adrenaline would die down, and all his bones would be broken. As the EMTS came to pick him up, and put him on a stretcher, his head would slowly list back and forth. He'd crack open one eye, and slowly lift it so that it points in your direction. He'd whisper, voice breaking and cracking all the while, "Thank you, thank you for putting me in my place. you have released me from the bondage of my own hate." Then he would pass-away silently, without family or friend.

name: dimwittedullard
text: I had to give it a happy ending. I can't succomb to the dark side. If someone wants to write an ending which is actualy realistic, I'd be pleased as punch to read it.

name: mortshire
text: right.  asherdan, people sometimes take pauses between sentences.  even when those people are fictional cartoon cats.  ray is just being a concerned listener.

name: scifigrl47
text: I always took that as less concerned and more, "Christ, you are amazingly dumb, and I share genetic code with you."  This is the polite, scrunched eyebrow look I get while talking to most of my Southern relatives.  We do not get along, as such.

name: evolume
text: Hey look, the guy who likes achewood so much, he doesn't even like it.

name: fielding
text: Must've been a rough week.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: do you get pissed off at movies during periods of no dialogue.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: I PAID FOR A TALKIE, DAMMIT!! WHAT IS THIS??!

name: achilleselbow
text: Ok now he is kind of being a dick. Though I suspect by now he's just reveling in his status as most hated man on the board and pretty much inviting the lames. Why comply?

name: scorpio_nadir
text: why ask why?

name: sp1derbaby
text: They told me I would understand. I understand painfully .

name: goatmasterflash
text: No, this one's different. It is a pregnant pause.

name: love_is_so_punk
text: It then gave birth to many baby pauses, each one more awkward than its parent.

name: redheron
text:
I dunno if I'd really call it merely a "big pause". I personally think the face Ray's making in the second to last panel sort of add to the strip.

(1 year later, but I just felt it needed to be said. Sorry if I'm a bother. (: )

name: link
text:
Actually, I saw the pause and thought nothing of it besides "I bet asherdan will have something to say about that."

First comment too, as always.

name: internnumber1
text: Wow. Even Ray thinks that is a terrible idea. The cat who put fake testicles on a cellphone won't get behind this idea.

name: epicurus
text:
I love the intersection between the otherwise distant worlds of the wealthy southern gentry and the weird internet photoshop business.

This is one of my favourites.

text: A comment left by aperson was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Jesler729, goocifer, STUART)

name: semiquaver
text: This is an Achewood strip. It is five.

text: Should've marketed it to the pregnancy fetishists.

name: slalvation
text:
YOU COULD UPLOAD PICTURES OF NAKED PEOPLE TO IT!!!

I THINK THIS VENTURE MAY BE A SUCCESS AFTER ALL.

name: drago25
text: Uncle Culpepper be one smooth operator

name: jaldor
text: The only possible application I can think of for a "rendering engine" of that sort is a twist on the ole "Hey mom I'm pregnant ... just kidding, but I do need money." bit. It'd actually work really well in greeting card format.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: forsooth!
